title: 1956 Holy Cross Crusaders football team
text:
The 1956 Holy Cross Crusaders football team was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> team that represented the <a href="College%20of%20the%20Holy%20Cross">College of the Holy Cross</a> as an independent during the <a href="1956%20NCAA%20University%20Division%20football%20season">1956 NCAA University Division football season</a>. In its 13th year under head coach <a href="Eddie%20Anderson%20%28American%20football%20coach%29">Eddie Anderson</a>, the team compiled a 5–3–1 record. The team played its home games at <a href="Fitton%20Field">Fitton Field</a> on the college's campus in <a href="Worcester%2C%20Massachusetts">Worcester, Massachusetts</a>.
